Text: GISB PreBoard Conference Call Cc Below are the items that will be discussed under the GISB Issues Update agenda item Please note that the pipeline segment Executive Committee representatives are bringing these items to your attention to raise your level of awareness We welcome your comments and suggestions We understand that the best course of action may be no action Lack of ratification results The Final Actions page of the GISB Web site has not been updated since January Three ratifications have taken place since that time two more are occuring this month Most importantly this information is needed for internal planning purposes for computer system changes GISB subcommittees also need this information in order to operate effectively ENA has been attempting to obtain the results of the April ratification since midApril Theyre unable to obtain verbal results much less something in writing or posted ENA is considering sending a letter to GISB requesting that the GISB Web site be kept uptodate If so theyll be looking for other parties to cosign Request logs are not kept current GISBs logs which show the status of requests have not been updated since May per the logs that were last posted These logs appear on two Web pages for standards requests and for interpretation requests The log that is currently posted for interpretations requests is dated May For standards requests the logs were removed from the Web site at least six months ago At that time they were current as of May Lack of participation This was mentioned during the December Board meeting The EC reps simply want you to be aware of this fact The Technical Subcommittee usually has two attendees including the chair The attendance at the Information Requirements Subcommittee IR meetings has slightly improved over the last couple of months As a reminder since Jim Keisler passed away IR is looking for a second cochair Ive been approached but have not yet given a response Shelley Brad and I are addressing this The May BPS meeting Youve received at least two emails on this topic The EC reps will answer any questions the Board members may have and again welcome your comments Thanks Theresa

Pipeline PreGISB BOD Conference Call Cc the agenda for the pipeline segment preGISB Board of Directors conference call As a reminder the call is scheduled for Wednesday June pm Central Time The conference call number is passcode is The items for discussion are Consideration of Retail Gas Electric and Wholesale Electric Standards Development Advisory Committee Review GISB Sunset Provision GISB Issues Update from the Pipeline Segment Executive Committee Representatives Thanks Theresa

PreGISB Board Meeting Cc McGill will not be able to attend the preBoard conference call this afternoon Hell be en route to Houston Michael Hansen will attend and update Terry Terry is planning to attend the Board meeting tomorrow TH
